Auth.loginDescription: Sign in to your account to continue
Auth.signupDescription: Join Surtopya to create surveys and earn rewards

Dashboard.title: Dashboard
Dashboard.noSurveys: You haven't created any surveys yet
Dashboard.startCreating: Start by creating your first survey

SurveyBuilder.title: Survey Builder
SurveyBuilder.estimatedTime: Estimated time to complete the survey
SurveyBuilder.addPageDescription: Pages help organize long surveys into sections
SurveyBuilder.datasetNoticeText: Responses to this survey will be de-identified and added to our Open Dataset Marketplace. This helps us keep the platform free for everyone.
SurveyBuilder.configureBeforePublish: Configure visibility and dataset options before publishing.
SurveyBuilder.firstPublishWarning: Once published, dataset sharing settings will be locked. Non-public surveys cannot be switched to public later.
SurveyBuilder.visibilityPublic: Visible to everyone in the marketplace
SurveyBuilder.publicDatasetNote: Public surveys must contribute to the dataset marketplace.
SurveyBuilder.nonPublicDatasetNote: Non-public surveys can opt-in to contribute to the dataset marketplace.

ConsentModal.title: Data Usage Consent
ConsentModal.description: Before you start building, please note how your survey data will be used:
ConsentModal.deidentificationText: All survey responses are automatically de-identified to protect participant privacy.
ConsentModal.marketplaceText: By default, de-identified datasets are contributed to our Open Marketplace to keep Surtopya free.
ConsentModal.paidOptoutText: Pro users can opt-out of data sharing for non-public surveys.

SurveyRenderer.thankYou: Thank you for completing this survey!
SurveyRenderer.previewWatermark: This is a preview. Responses will not be saved.

Datasets.title: Dataset Marketplace
Datasets.description: Explore and access high-quality de-identified datasets to power your research and development.

Explore.title: Explore Surveys
Explore.description: Discover surveys and earn points by sharing your opinions
Explore.noSurveys: No surveys available at the moment
Explore.checkBackLater: Check back later for new surveys

Pricing.title: Pricing
Pricing.description: Choose the plan that's right for you

About.title: About Surtopya
About.missionText: Surtopya is a privacy-preserving survey platform that connects researchers with quality data while protecting user privacy.
About.forResearchersText: Create surveys, collect responses, and access de-identified datasets from our marketplace.
About.forParticipantsText: Share your opinions, earn points, and know your data is protected.
About.privacyFirstText: All data is automatically de-identified before being shared or stored.

Errors.notFoundDescription: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
Errors.serverErrorDescription: Something went wrong on our end. Please try again later.
Errors.unauthorizedDescription: You need to be logged in to access this page.
Errors.forbiddenDescription: You don't have permission to access this resource.
